downloadTitle: Operations guide for Microsoft SharePoint Foundation 2010 Beta
downloadDescription: Contains information about the basic fundamentals of how to operate and maintain SharePoint Foundation 2010 Beta.
detailsSection: This document supports a preliminary release of Microsoft SharePoint Foundation 2010 Beta. The  content in this book covers information about how to operate and maintain your servers, server farms, sites, and solutions in SharePoint Foundation 2010 Beta.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
